import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect,useState } from 'react' function Editproducts(props) { console.log(props.id) const[products,setProducts]=useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:4000/admin') .then((res)=>{ console.log(res) setProducts(res.data.products) }) },[]) function viewImage(event){ document.getElementById("imageView").src=URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]) } return (

name{products.name}

viewImage()}/>
) } export default Editproducts
